original_text: Some Israelite people were also there in Jerusalem for the Passover festival at that time. They also stayed seven more days for the festival of Flat Bread.
korean_text: 그 때에 모인 이스라엘 자손이 유월절을 지키고 이어서 무교절을 칠 일 동안 지켰으니

sentences.original_text: Some Israelite people were also there in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이스라엘 백성들도 또한 예루살렘에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: for the Passover festival at that time
They also stayed seven more days
for the festival of Flat Bread
